channel.title: Setting max players on a server
channel.description: How do you change the max number of players able to join your server? Because now the max is 10 people, but since more and more people join, i need to get it higher. Where and how can i change this?

item.title: Setting max players on a server
item.dc:creator: @Enum Enum
item.description:
@Enum wrote:

[quote=“SirPali, post:1, topic:48882”]How do you change the max number of players able to join your server?
Because now the max is 10 people, but since more and more people join, i need to get it higher.
Where and how can i change this?[/quote]

Evidently you could just use the Search button.

Read full topic
item.source: Setting max players on a server

item.title: Setting max players on a server
item.dc:creator: @wazup wazup
item.description:
@wazup wrote:

oepn player.handler and search for public static final int maxPlayers = 10; if u cant find it look for public static final int maxPlayers = change da number after = to like 20 for 20 peeps should work
den save it and compile

Read full topic
